sourcesContent:
<template>

</template>

<script>
import ProductDataService from '@/services/ProductDataService.js'
export default {
  props: ['inventory', 'addInv', 'updateInv', 'removeInv'],
  data () {
    return {
      name: '',
      price: '',
      quantity: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    addInv () {
      const product = {
        name: this.name,
        price: this.price,
        quantity: this.quantity
      }
      this.addInv(product)
      this.name = ''
      this.price = ''
      this.quantity = ''
    }
  }
}
</script>
